title: Wireless Mirroring for Android Phones via WiFi
content:
Hello,

I'm in the process of upgrading my Kenwood head unit in my car to the next model up.

There are two i am looking at, one states wired and wireless Android Auto and the other states Wireless Mirroring for Android Phones via WiFi.

There is about a Â£200 difference  between the two, i am wondering if I go for the cheaper unit with the Wireless Mirroring  for Android phones via WiFi, will my Google Pixel 4 work or do I have to go for the very latest totally wireless unit ?

Thanks for any advice.

Bobby
